'''Straight to the Heart''' is a repeatable basic daily [[commission]] in Teyvat.

==Steps==
{{Quest Description|Reach the destination within the time limit. Defeating an opponent will give you a little bit of extra time.}}
# Complete the Time Challenge.
#* Stand on the [[Pressure Plate]] to start the challenge and reach the target location within the given amount of time. [[Slimes]] will spawn once the challenge starts and will disappear after the countdown. Each kill adds 5 extra seconds.

==Notes==
* If quick enough, the player can get straight to the end point without defeating any enemies.
* Since the timer starts when the [[Pressure Plate]] is activated, using talents to trigger the sensor from a distance can allow you to get a head start. (If the talent persists for over 20–25 seconds, it can restart the challenge after a failure without requiring your character to return to the sensor.)
* The slimes for this commission are significantly weaker to allow for the player to rack up additional time.
* This challenge can be completed quickly in [[Co-Op Mode]] by having one player stand at the beginning and one player stand at the end.
